title: Google Maps Scraper Input
description: Configure your Google Maps scraping job. Provide search terms with a location, or direct Google Maps URLs.

searchTerms.title: Search Terms
searchTerms.description: List of search terms to look up on Google Maps (e.g., 'Italian Restaurant', 'Dentist', 'Hotel')
searchTerms.sectionDescription: Define what and where to search. Use either search terms + location, or direct URLs.

location.title: Location
location.description: Single city, region, or country to search in (e.g., 'New York, USA'). Use 'Locations' below to search multiple areas.

locations.title: Locations (multi-location)
locations.description: List of cities/regions to search in. Each search term will be run in every location (cross-join). Overrides the single Location field if both are set.

directUrls.title: Direct Google Maps URLs
directUrls.description: Direct Google Maps search or place URLs to scrape (alternative to search terms + location)

maxResults.title: Max Results Per Search
maxResults.description: Maximum number of places to scrape per search term

scrapeReviews.title: Scrape Reviews
scrapeReviews.description: Extract individual reviews for each place (charged per review)

reviewsLimit.title: Reviews Limit Per Place
reviewsLimit.description: Maximum number of reviews to extract per place

scrapeOpeningHours.title: Scrape Opening Hours
scrapeOpeningHours.description: Extract opening hours for each place

scrapeEmails.title: Scrape Emails from Websites
scrapeEmails.description: Visit each business's website to find contact email addresses. Adds ~5 seconds per place but provides valuable lead data.

minRating.title: Minimum Rating Filter
minRating.description: Only include places with this rating or higher (leave empty for all)

proxyConfig.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfig.description: Proxy settings for avoiding blocks. Enable Apify Proxy if you get blocked.
